Actions.Name: Completed Envelope
Actions.Description: When an envelope is fully completed by all signees

Actions.Name: Created Envelope
Actions.Description: When a new envelope is created within E-Sign

Actions.Name: Create Envelope
Actions.Description: Create and send a new E-Sign envelope

Actions.Name: Create Envelope From Template
Actions.Description: Create a new envelope for signing using one of your E-Sign templates.

Actions.Name: Signee Signs
Actions.Description: When an individual signer signs a document of the Envelope

Actions.Name: Upload File to E-Sign Action
Actions.Description: Uploads a file to the E-Sign platform which can be used to create a document for signing
